org.mongodb.operation

Interface ServerChannelProvider


  • public interface ServerChannelProvider
    A provider of channels to a single server.

      Channel getChannel()
      Provide a channel to the server.

    • Method Detail

      • getServerDescription

        ServerDescription getServerDescription()
        Returns:
        the description of the server that this provider is providing channels to.

        Provide a channel to the server. A provider may choose to return the same Channel
        Returns:
